特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

【合併】英語IIｂ　２０（経済学部）/英語IIIｂ　２０（経済学部）
授業方法: Classes will be interactive and group-work based, with some language and skills guidance from the teacher. Learners are expected to participate actively in all tasks to gain the maximum benefit to their spoken English skills. There will be a range of spoken tasks, including group discussions, presentations, supported by reading & listening tasks. Materials will include a selection from the textbook as well as additional materials distributed in class and on LUNA.

トピック.授業計画1: This course will use a range of in-class tasks to help develop learners’ spoken fluency as well as ability to deliver more effective presentations & use a range of skills to interact more successfully in group discussions/conversations.
トピック.授業外学習2: Learners will be expected to completed homework tasks from the course text to review and prepare for classes each week.
